items.title: Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ DenverRAICES was live.Breaking News! Undocumented Mother Jeanette Vizguerra leaves the safety of...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ DenverRAICES was live.

Breaking News! Undocumented Mother Jeanette Vizguerra leaves the safety of sanctuary to travel to Joe Biden's transition headquarters to demand the President-elect issue a moratorium that puts an end to detentions and deportations on Day 1. #MoratoriumDay1

items.title: Jeanette Vizguerra has left the safety of sanctuary to travel to...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Jeanette Vizguerra has left the safety of sanctuary to travel to Biden transition headquarters to demand the President-elect issue a moratorium to put an end to detention and deportations on Day 1. Undocumented folks are at President-elect Joe Biden’s transition HQ today to demand he prioritize undocumented people in his first 100 days, starting on day 1. No more broken promises. We need immediate executive action.

#MoratoriumDay1 Sanctuary4All Colorado Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition Colorado Immigrant Rights Coalition - CIRC AFSC & Coloradans For Immigrant Rights

items.title: Immigration rights and immigration reform must be central to the...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Immigration rights and immigration reform must be central to the incoming Biden administration. Temporary relief like DACA, TPS, and other programs for immigrant and refugee communities are not enough. Families are torn apart at our borders and within our communities, incarcerated unjustly and unnecessarily during a global pandemic. Hundreds are living in sanctuary, fighting for a way to stay with their families in the United States.

There are millions of immigrants and refugees living in the U.S. who have no path to legal status. Join AFSC & Coloradans For Immigrant Rights Sanctuary4All Colorado Colorado Immigrant Rights Coalition - CIRC Abolish ICE Denver and Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition and impacted families to demand change!

#FreeThemAll

WED, JAN 13

Caravan for Immigration Reform

1200 Acoma St, Denver, CO 80204-3627, United StatesCauses · 234 people

items.title: Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ DenverBlack Lives Matter 5280**********ATTENTION: URGENT MATTER********** #WindsorGardensPhoneZap After...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ DenverBlack Lives Matter 5280

**********ATTENTION: URGENT MATTER**********

#WindsorGardensPhoneZap
After community came for their necks just last week, Windsor Gardens is back at it with ano...ther member of their community battling racial injustice. Call and demand their Community Response team immediately stop all persecution of Sherry Dillahunty all day today 1/6/2021.

Ms. Dillahunty’s neighbors are weaponizing Community Response and Covenant Enforcement and the police against her and openly admit to it!

Call now and keep calling to let them know community is watching we will not stand by and watch as their tenants engage in racial terror against our elder!

Use this sample script:
“Hello, my name is _____ and I am calling to demand that the Community Response and Covenant Enforcement at Windsor Garden stop allowing racist neighbors to terrorize Sherry Dilahunty. Ms. Dillahunty has the right to move freely through her community and we will not stand for any further discrimination against her from Windsor Gardens. “

#BlackLivesMatter
#TheFightContinues
#TheTimeisNow
#ApplyPressure

[Image description: White and yellow words on a black background that reads, “CALL TO ACTION. Hashtag Windsor Gardens Phone Zap. CALL NOW! Director of Community Response and Convenant Enforcement: Chris Scovil. Phone: 303-364-7685 x1515. Email: cscovil@wgamail.com. Community Response Captain of Operations: Eddie Strock. Phone: 303-364-4924. Email: estrock@wgamail.com. The rest of the image includes the same text as this post. Black Lives Matter 5280 logo at the bottom.]

See More

items.title: We want to boost this post to raise awareness about what is...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

We want to boost this post to raise awareness about what is happening in the Tigray region of Ethiopia. For more information on current actions, please keep an eye on the Black Lives Matter 5280 facebook page.

Millete Birhanemaskel

Want to do something great today? Tweet #TigrayGenocide Day 60. (I'm @gualjeganu)

The Ethiopian government is angry, calling us "bots" and an "organized campaign." They underestimate our love for Tigray. We will not stop until we reach our families!!!

#TigrayGenocide Day 60

items.title: Sanctuary4All is continuing their amazing Solidarity Meals in...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Sanctuary4All is continuing their amazing Solidarity Meals in the new year! See below for more info on the program and for the schedule. They’ll be selling gorditas, pupusas, sandwiches, chile relleno, pozole, burritos, & more this month. Orders for gorditas next week are open at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

"Sanctuary4All created this program for solidarity meals based on the pandemic many immigrant families are now unemployed and are fighting their deportation proce...sses and need to keep paying legal fees. Both Saturday’s at the middle of the month different families have been raising funds for themselves to be able to survive and pay legal fees now that neither can receive federal benefits. Help us and the families to survive during this hard time, they like to work for their resources and are happy in showing with this program their culture now that every week food from different countries is sold while connecting with the community to create relationships of support and solidarity between community and organizations." (from Sanctuary4All)

See MoreSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

The Solidarity Meals schedule is up for the new year! We’ll be selling gorditas, pupusas, sandwiches, chile relleno, pozole, burritos, & more this month. Orders for gorditas next week are open at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

items.title: CW: graphic descriptions of violence in linked article. We want...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

CW: graphic descriptions of violence in linked article.

We want to highlight what is happening right now in the Tigray region of Ethiopia. The article tells the often-invisible story of many people living in our community who are worried about their missing family and friends.

If you don't already, make sure to follow Black Lives Matter 5280 to learn more about actions and efforts to support our neighbors and impacted people in and around the Tigray region. We will continue to share here as we learn of ways to support locally or in the region directly.

items.title: Jeanette from Sanctuary4All Colorado is selling tamales for...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Jeanette from Sanctuary4All Colorado is selling tamales for pickup on 12/23 at 1400 Lafayette. Don't miss out! $24 / 1 dozen. Flavor combinations listed in the form.

100% of proceeds go to support needs of immigrant families. Help Jeanette raise the $ she needs to keep fighting!

https://christmastamales.paperform.co/

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Miss out on tamales from Yessenia? Jeanette is selling them for pickup at 5:00pm on December 23, just in time for Christmas. You can order at https://ChristmasTamales.paperform.co. Does your family make tamales for Nochebuena o Navidad? Let us know in the comments!

items.title: Gaby from Sanctuary4All Colorado is selling pollo en mole &...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Gaby from Sanctuary4All Colorado is selling pollo en mole & tofu con sabor mexicano. Pickup in Denver & Boulder on December 19. Sanctuary 4 All is immigrant-led, and all funds go directly back to families to support their needs. One of the meals this week is vegan!

Order: https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
Pay: @gabriela.miranda-42

...

[image: Solidarity Meals cooked by Gaby. Pollo en mole - $13 - chicken smothered in mole with a side of rice and beans. tofu con sabor Mexicano - $10 - cooked with chile, tomato, onion, and arugula, served with a side of rice and beans]

Gaby's husband was deported earlier this year, and Gaby’s been working to support their family on her own ever since. This weekend she’s raising money to help pay for legal fees associated with her husband’s appeal.

See MoreSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Gaby is selling pollo en mole & tofu con sabor mexicano on December 19. Her husband was deported earlier this year, and Gaby’s been working to support their fam...ily on her own ever since. items.title: Check out what the folks at Denver Alliance for Street Health...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Check out what the folks at Denver Alliance for Street Health Response have going on until 12/19 for their Transforming Safety Summit. Links to events are in original post.

Denver Alliance for Street Health Response

Join us in a couple hours as we share our work and talk about the Transforming Safety Week. This week will have nearly a dozen conversations to bring our work t...ogether with community members and elected officials in Colorado as well as other partners around the country. Check out the full week and links below.

Week of Events:

12/13 7pm Introducing DASHR and Transforming Safety: DASHR introduces its work and discusses what to expect from the Transforming Safety Summit
Event: https://fb.me/e/1YzN9i6hA

12/14 4pm National Perspectives on Transforming Safety: Chicago, Long Island, and Los Angeles are all cities in different stages of creating programs influenced by CAHOOTS and STAR – individuals from each area join DASHR to discuss their work and the potential for non-police alternatives
Event: https://fb.me/e/20O9KDgH0

12/14 5:15pm Douglas County Regional Roundtable: Community members in Douglas County discuss safety and seeking racial justice in their communities.
Event: https://fb.me/e/7ScjNttEl

12/15 11am Jefferson County Regional Roundtable: Community members in Jefferson County discuss safety and seeking racial justice in their communities.
Event: Still updating

12/16 4pm Public Health for Public Safety: A Community Movement to Engage and Heal Crime Survivors: The Public Health for Public Safety Leadership Team with Denver Public Health presents the findings from their survey that collected perspectives from victims of crime.
Event: https://fb.me/e/3hCP8XJ0h

12/17 2pm Behavioral Health Crisis Alternatives: The Vera Institute presents its findings on CAHOOTS and programs inspired by the non-police model. They are joined by DASHR and programs in Portland, Oregon and Olympia, Washington.
Event: https://fb.me/e/3jk684ccJ

12/18 4pm Restorative Approaches in the Criminal Justice System: District Attorneys Beth McCann (Denver) and Michael Dougherty (Boulder) and District Attorney-elect Alexis King discuss restorative justice and alternatives to jail and punishment.
Event: https://fb.me/e/3hZrM4Xyx

12/18 7pm Youth-Led Conversation with Congressman Crow: YAASPA brings community concerns to Representative Jason Crow (CD 6).
Event: https://fb.me/e/Aua06eEC

12/19 12pm Alternatives to Police and Reprioritizing Public Safety: City Council members from different cities in Colorado join DASHR to discuss CAHOOTS, STAR, and public safety.
Event: https://fb.me/e/1nkiARppK

12/20 1pm CHAT Hearing (Denver): The Colorado Blueprint to End Hunger and DASHR host their first CHAT: Community Healing, Action, and Truth Hearing to connect the issue of hunger to safety and systemic violence such as racism and poverty.
Event: https://fb.me/e/2czaD2r6J

See More

items.title: Celestial Alegría's #Reparations Network --> keep...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Celestial Alegría's #Reparations Network --> keep engaging & contributing!

Celestial Alegría

Community we are so powerful! With your support we have raised $10,000 for the #CelestialAlegria #ReparationsNetwork over the last 6 months! Together we created... a community fund that paid $500 of #Reparations to 20 #Black leaders, artists, healers, organizers and organizations! We are making reparations a reality!!

We were able to meet the current $5,000 goal because @madre.jaguar through their work with @mystic_bazaar will be hosting a Winter Solstice Ritual on December 21st and has generously offered to contribute part of the money raised from that event to the reparations network! For more details on how to participate in that event stay tuned.

I am so honored to be a steward of this effort! I am so in awe of our collective power! I am deeply grateful for each and everyone of you! Thank you!
#DefendBlackLives #BLM #BlackLivesMatter #BlackLiberation #ConfrontAntiBlackness #BlackAndBrownUnity #Solidarity #RacialJustice #CollectiveCare #Joy #Transformation #Healing #LifeCoach #Organizer #Leader #Trainer #Consultant

See More

items.title: Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All Colorado is an immigrant-led...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All Colorado is an immigrant-led group dedicated to protecting families and improving the lives of Colorado immigrants of all backgrounds. "Founded in 2019 by longtime immigration activist Jeanette Vizguerra, Sanctuary4All works at the intersection of mutual aid and political action. By connecting directly impacted families with caring members of our community we will lift each other up and build a movement to affect positive systemic change for the masses."

You can support our mission at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co committing to a monthly donation via Patreon at Patreon.com/Sanctuary4All or donating to sanctuary-4-all on Venmo. 💕✨

Follow S4All's page to find out about their upcoming Solidarity Meal, tamales by the dozen!

Become a patron of Sanctuary4All today: Get access to exclusive content and experiences on the world’s largest membership platform for artists and creators.

patreon.com

Sanctuary4All is creating support for people directly impacted by deportation | Patreon

items.title: Join the Denver Citizen Oversight Board on Wednesday, December...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Join the Denver Citizen Oversight Board on Wednesday, December 9, 2020 from 6:00-8:00 p.m. for a special presentation from Denver Independent Monitor Nicholas Mitchell on the findings in "The Police Response to the 2020 George Floyd Protests in Denver, an Independent Review." Q&A to follow. Please follow this Zoom link to join the meeting: https://denvergov-org.zoom.us/j/83632903850…

Read the report: https://www.denvergov.org/…/374/docum…/2020GFPReport_OIM.pdf
Media coverag...e:
https://denverite.com/…/police-officers-acted-dangerously-…/

https://www.denverpost.com/…/denver-police-protest-indepen…/

See MoreDenver Police’s response to massive racial justice protests this summer lacked adequate records that made it difficult for leaders to evaluate decision-making, the independent monitor found.

denverpost.com

Excessive force, poor communication marred Denver police response to George Floyd protests, independent monitor finds

Denver Police’s response to massive racial justice protests this summer lacked adequate records that made it difficult for leaders to evaluate decision-making, the independent monitor found.Denver Police’s response to massive racial justice protests this summer lacked adequate records that made it difficult for leaders to evaluate decision-making, the independent monitor found.

items.title: White folks who are taking to the streets in solidarity, are...
items.content_html:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

White folks who are taking to the streets in solidarity, are your actions and decisions centering Black, Indigenous, and People of Color? This document provides guidance on how to prioritize the vision of BIPOC organizers, tips for keeping safe during actions, and direction for white accomplices acting in a security/marshal role. This document also includes BIPOC led organizations doing amazing work in Colorado.

https://bit.ly/2Mnw0Nd
